column4: please help me : in ubuntu 8.04 my cpu load when my system isn't busy , cpu monitor applet show my cpu 100 % and in gnome-system monitor doesn't task that load cpu larger than 10% and my laptob go to hot , when i restart my system this problem solve but after some time again my cpu load 100% , what should i do ?
check which process uses all the CPU when it happens
: i check and often , not any of program that use cpu
